TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_basketball, title = basketball, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/basketball} }

S.FORM: basketball nu Amuhuwan a sasakama, lanciw nu Sakizaya a kamu. kakiliman a mimali tu lanciw a tusaay ku kabut milabu sa, anu mimali kina lanciwan u tanayaay a sapimali, anu tahkal mimali lima aca ku tademaw mimali, kina mali taneng misaliwliw tatacuwa a mipakah mimali atu kulukulud atu mikili tu mali, kian mali kanca a mitemec tu tumaan amimaliay, anu mimali tu matatemec mipuluh tu tumaay a mimaliay, kya makaala tu sapitemec. kina lanciw i kitaki u sakaydihan nu katuuday mimali kuynian, nama 1936 a mihcaan malingatu aoyunhui malalucek a mitademecay a mammalian, i tini pakatuluay a hun nu ulic makawait tu mali tusaay ku nikaalaan tu nikatemecan, anu i tuluay nu hun a ulic miwait tuluay ku nikawaitan a nikaalaan. anu mamin matademec sa, anu cima ku sayadahay ani waitan wyda ku kata, anu malecad ku nikaalaan sa misatanayu aca midademec, anu mimali hen, u mimaliay taneng matulin mimali (hayni pimali i lalad, pasayni i udip nu lima sa) kya malingatu madupa a mipapeli i dumaan a tademaw, anu papeli i dumaan a mimaliyay, anu muculil (ya mimaliay sa, anu caay pimali muculil aca tu mipimaliay kina kakawawan), anu pelihen ku mali atu kina tusa mimali sa patelacay kuynian. nilacul

basketball no Amohowan a sasakama, lanciw no Sakizaya a kamo. kakiliman a mimali to lanciw a tosaay ko kabot milabo sa, ano mimali kina lanciwan o tanayaay a sapimali, ano tahkal mimali lima aca ko tademaw mimali, kina mali taneng misaliwliw tatacowa a mipakah mimali ato kolokolod ato mikili to mali, kian mali kanca a mitemec to tomaan amimaliay, ano mimali to matatemec mipoloh to tomaay a mimaliay, kya makaala to sapitemec. kina lanciw i kitaki o sakaydihan no katooday mimali koynian, nama 1936 a mihcaan malingato aoyonhoi malalocek a mitademecay a mammalian, i tini pakatoloay a hon no olic makawait to mali tosaay ko nikaalaan to nikatemecan, ano i toloay no hon a olic miwait toloay ko nikawaitan a nikaalaan. ano mamin matademec sa, ano cima ko sayadahay ani waitan wyda ko kata, ano malecad ko nikaalaan sa misatanayo aca midademec, ano mimali hen, o mimaliay taneng matolin mimali (hayni pimali i lalad, pasayni i odip no lima sa) kya malingato madopa a mipapeli i domaan a tademaw, ano papeli i domaan a mimaliyay, ano mocolil (ya mimaliay sa, ano caay pimali mocolil aca to mipimaliay kina kakawawan), ano pelihen ko mali ato kina tosa mimali sa patelacay koynian. nilacol
